about_the_game:
Rusty's Day Off is a sci-fi FPS with puzzle elements, which puts you in the shoes of Rusty, a janitor, on his day off. When Rusty receives an alert that someone has broken into one of his labs at work, he must act quickly to find out who's responsible and what they're after.


The game combines classic FPS action with puzzle elements. If you enjoy a little thinking between your shooting, then this game might be for you!


Armed with high-tech gadgets, such as plasma weapons, bouncy boxing gloves and hoverboards, you must make your way through Rusty's workplace, fight his rogue robots, solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the break-in. Along the way, you'll meet some quirky characters, explore hidden areas, and learn more about why Rusty's robots have gone mad.

KEY FEATURES

  • A variety of movement mechanics from dashes to double-jumps to "rocket" boosts.
  • Non-linear levels with puzzle elements sprinkled in.
  • Unique graphics which blends stylized elements with realistic lighting - it looks cool!
  • FPS action with adventure and puzzle elements - parry-mechanic included.
  • Story-based campaign with voice acting where you are always in control of the character - no cutscenes!
  • Optional permadeath mechanic - good luck with that, it's difficult.
  • VR version included for free!

VR SUPPORTED

The game includes an optional VR mode using Oculus VR, which allows you to play the entire game using an Oculus VR headset and Oculus Touch controllers.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of stylized violence.
